about_the_game:
Dive into a city where every conversation could be the key to solving a murder or the reason you’re led astray! Case Closed is a gripping, first-person detective game that puts you in the role of an investigator navigating a world where every citizen has their own story to tell.

Begin your journey as a detective in a city filled with AI-driven citizens. Each individual has a unique backstory and motivations that could be crucial to solving the mystery.

Utilize a unique dialogue system to engage with AI citizens. Click to initiate conversation, type your inquiries, and navigate through dynamic responses that evolve based on your approach and previous interactions.

Pay close attention to the details. The devil is in the dialogue, and each interaction could reveal a crucial piece of the puzzle. Keep meticulous notes on alibis, motives, and relationships to expose inconsistencies.

When you believe you’ve identified the murderer, head to the police station to make your accusation. Choose wisely—your reputation and the safety of the city depend on your accuracy.

Step into the role of a detective in Case Closed, where every case is a new challenge. Can you navigate through the lies and secrets to uncover the truth? Your detective journey begins now. Prove you have what it takes to solve the mystery before it’s too late!

The game is in Early Access—join our community on Discord and help shape the future of Case Closed. Your feedback is essential in creating the ultimate detective experience!

legal_notice:
DISCLAIMER


Use of Local AI-Driven NPCs in Case Closed
In Case Closed, developed by Otso Tech, we utilize a local Large Language Model (LLM) integrated directly into the game to provide dynamic, AI-driven NPC interactions. All inputs you provide during gameplay are processed locally on your device.

Data Handling and Privacy:
No Personal Data Collection: Otso Tech does not collect, store, or process any personal data. All gameplay inputs and NPC responses are handled locally on your machine.

Third-Party Software Notices:
The AI-driven functionality in Case Closed uses third-party software libraries under the following licenses:
• llama.cpp (MIT License)
• llamafile (Apache 2.0 License)

For more details on the licenses, please refer to the respective project pages.

Player Advisory:
We advise players not to input sensitive, personal, or financial information during gameplay. The game is designed for entertainment purposes only.

By playing Case Closed, you acknowledge and agree to the local processing of your inputs as described.

Thank you for playing Case Closed.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD FX-9590 or better
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 670 2GB / AMD R9 280 better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980 / AMD R9 Fury
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
